amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to transfer cell site simulators, or IMSI Catcher, or similar cell phone tower mimicking technology to state and local law enforcement that haven't adopted procedures for the use of such technology that protects the constitutional rights of citizens.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Schweikert amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Schweikert.
